trans-unit.source: Provides <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> objects for each state of the regular button portion of a combined regular button and drop-down button.
This class cannot be inherited.

Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.SplitButton> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the regular button portion of a combined regular button and drop-down button.
trans-unit.target: Cada propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.SplitButton> classe retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> para um estado diferente da parte de botão regular de um botão de regular combinada e um botão suspenso.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.SplitButton.HotChecked%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.SplitButton.HotChecked%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole-o em um formulário do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementToolBarSplitButton6` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Controlar o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventos e chamadas de `DrawVisualStyleElementToolBarSplitButton6` método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> método de manipulação de eventos, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a visual style element that represents a split button in the checked state.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> that represents a split button in the checked state.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> que representa um botão de divisão no estado de ativação.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.SplitButton.Checked%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.SplitButton.Checked%2A> propriedade para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
